days.text: Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northwesterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
